briefTitle: Long-Term, Open-Label Study Of CP-690,550 For Treatment Of Rheumatoid Arthritis In Japan
officialTitle: A Long-term, Open-label Study Of Cp-690,550 to Confirm The Safety Following Long Term Administration Of Cp-690,550 In The Treatment Of Rheumatoid Arthritis
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the long-term effectiveness and safety of CP-690,550 for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis. Subjects are only eligible for this study after they have completed participation in another "qualifying" study of CP-690,550.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (AEs) or Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
